ygData.subject: Re: Gob Pets in Oasis?
ygData.msgSnippet: Cazic Thule himself has a shield and a robe. There aren t any classes I can think of that can wear both of these items. I guess the GMs decide not to load
ygData.messageBody:
Cazic Thule himself has a shield and a robe. There
aren't any classes I can think of that can wear both
of these items. I guess the GMs decide not to load
character limiting items either. If a NPC creature
killed player Wizards in Cazic and could loot, there
is a good chance they would get rubicite too. :)

Belgarth

--- MFerrulo@... wrote:
> From: MFerrulo@...
>
> In a message dated 8/5/99 4:04:26 PM Eastern
> Daylight Time,
> DDiina@... writes:
>
> <<
> Speaking of GM organized events....the other day on
> my server (Xegony) a GM
> took over the Tae Archeon in Cazic Thule.....he was
> a lvl 50 Wizard and was
> casting Ice Comet.....he killed everybody...no one
> lost any exp though which
> was cool....the GM did finally fall to a Lvl 50
> Mage named Hast who hangs
> out in CT actually helping people!!! That's right a
> lvl 50 who helps
> people.....anyways Hast told me he got a FULL set
> of rubicite armor and a
> shiny mettalic robe off the GM controlled Tae
> Archeon.....WOW is all I could
> say >>
>
> Why did the GM Wizard have rubicite armor? Can
> Wizards can't wear that stuff
> and lvl 50 or not a Wizard would never have the
> strength to carry it around
> in inventory. This seems bizarre
>
> Wizaro Wrathcaster
> Solusek Ro
